item.title: Putting the Wacom Tablet to Good Use!
item.description: Originally posted on my old blog I’ve had a Wacom tablet for a long time now, but there’s just never been a legitimate use for it, really. Everything that I could do with the tablet, I could also do with my laptop’s touchscreen and stylus, so it always seemed like a bit of a waste. Sure, the drawing experience is a little bit better, the screen is a bit larger, but why use a Wacom tablet when the touchscreen and stylus work just fine?
